Plot: All the kids in a town over night become feverish and have convulsions. The next day they start to become evil, change their names for those of kids killed long ago, and then start killing ...
Title: Children of the Corn: The Gathering
Writer: Stephen King (short story "Children of the Corn"), Stephen Berger, Greg Spence
Actors: Naomi Watts, Jamie Renée Smith, Karen Black, Mark Salling
